LESSON.HEADINGS: <1>First an exercise to loosen up.</1> <2>These are good warm-up sentences.</2> <3>Now let's get some numerals going.</3> <4>Good work! Now do the following exercise.</4> <5>And one more for good measure!</5>
LESSON.DESCRIPTION: The ninth lesson will introduce you to using numerals.

TASK.TEXT: aqaz swsx dedc frfv gtgb ;p;/ lol. kik, jujm hyhn aqaz

Now is the time for all good men to come to the aid of
the party. Now is the time for all good men to come to
the aid of the party. The quick brown fox jumped over
the lazy dogs. The quick brown fox jumped over them!
